author: carilyn c

comments.message: Hi Carilyn, we're so glad that you are inspired to share OpenIDEO with your networks. Just to clarify something - this challenge is not sponsored by BIll Gates, it is sponsored by USAID, the White House office for Science and Technology Policy and the Centre for Disease Control. Thanks for spreading the word!

Hello Deborah,  thanks for the correction...   I meant the website OpenIDEO, rather than the challenge being sponsored by Bill Gates, but that may be a wrong thought too that somehow got in my head..  hmm.
This idea can be repeated world wide. It could turn OpenIDEO into something like artificial intelligence ..!
